Locale.Value:
Timeline

  1. You can use Alt+ Click, Shift + Click and Ctrl+Click keyboard combinations to perform copy, align and insert clips on the timeline more convenient.
  2. You can copy and paste transitions directly on the timeline now.
  3. The scrolling direction of the timeline are now switchable in keyboard shortcuts setting window.
  4. Select, Audio Stretch and Quick Split tools are put together on the timeline toolbar.

Titles

  1. The texts you input after editing the titles are now shown directly on the title clip in timeline directly.
  2. Optimized the default border and shadow preset for creating SRT subtitles.

Property Panel

  1. More accurate controls for popup buttons and input fields.
  2. Added keyframe shortcuts support adding transparency keyframes
  3. You can use the Ctrl+ Mouse wheel combination to zoom in and out in the preview player directly.

Miscellaneous

  1. Added a checkbox in export setting window to remember the export profile you used last time.
  2. Able to set default project settings for starting projects quicker next time.
  3. The quick through guide is updated to fit Filmora V12 layout better.
  4. The recommendations in “Audio” library can be filtered as Music and Sound Effect.
  5. Optimized the workflow for sharing files to Filmora Workspace collaboration platform.
  6. And fixed some bugs.
